home.title: Umhloli wejubane wokulanda amavidiyo wamahhala
home.subtitle: Landa amavidiyo ku-YouTube, Instagram, TikTok nakwezinye

meta.title: Umhloli Wevidiyo Wamahhala — YouTube, TikTok, Instagram | Ikhwalithi ye-HD ne-4K
meta.description: Landa amavidiyo avela ku-YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, VK mahhala ngaphandle kokubhalisa. Ama-Shorts, ama-Reels, ama-Stories ngekhwalithi ye-HD ne-4K. Shesha, kuphephile, awekho amawatermark.

about.title: Inkonzo eyodwa — zonke izinkundla
about.text1: Ufuna indlela ethembekile yokulondoloza amavidiyo owathandayo? Umhloli wethu wamahhala wokulanda amavidiyo aku-inthanethi usekela iziza ezidume kakhulu zokusingatha amavidiyo kanye nezinethiwekhi zokuxhumana: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, VK, Vimeo, nezinye eziningi. Akudingeki ufake noma yiluphi uhlelo lokusebenza — konke kusebenza ngqo kusiphequluli sakho.
about.text2: Gcina amavidiyo ngekhwalithi ephezulu kakhulu etholakalayo — kusukela ku-360p kuya ku-4K Ultra HD. Amavidiyo omculo, ama-Shorts, ama-Reels, ama-Stories, izifundo, noma ama-vlogs — insizakalo yethu iyakwazi konke. Landa amavidiyo ngaphandle kwamawatermark ngekhwalithi yawo yokuqala.
about.text3: Vele unamathisele i-URL yevidiyo, khetha ifomethi nekhwalithi oyikhethayo, bese ulanda. Shesha, mahhala, futhi kungaziwa. Akudingeki ubhalisele, akukho ukuqoqwa kwedatha, futhi akukho izimali ezifihliwe.

fast.title: Isivinini somhlatsi
fast.text: Amaseva ethu athuthukisiwe acubungula amavidiyo ngokushesha kakhulu kunezinye izinsizakalo ezifanayo.onga isikhathi sakho ngokulanda ngesivinini esiphezulu

safe.title: Kuphephile futhi kungasese
safe.text: Ubumfihlo bakho bubalulekile. Asiqoqi imininingwane yakho siqu, asidingi ukubhalisa, futhi asigcini umlando wakho wokulanda. Kungaziwa ngokuphelele.

free.title: Mahhala ngokuphelele
free.text: Zonke izici ziyatholakala ngaphandle kokukhokha, ukubhalisa, noma imikhawulo efihliwe. Ukudawuniloda okungenamkhawulo, mahhala unomphela.

platforms.title: Uhlu lwamapulatifomu olukhulayo
platforms.text: YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, VK, Vimeo — futhi lokhu kuwukuqala nje. Sihlala sengeza ukwesekwa kwamanye amapulatifomu amasha.

noInstall.title: Akukho ukufakwa
noInstall.text: Isebenza ngqo kusiphequluli sakho kunoma iyiphi idivayisi. Akudingeki ulande izinhlelo zokusebenza noma izandiso — vele uvule isayithi bese uqala ukulanda.

quality.title: Ikhwalithi engcono kakhulu
quality.text: Landa amavidiyo ngenani lawo langempela kuze kufike ku-4K Ultra HD. Khetha phakathi kwezinhlobo eziningi: MP4, MP3, WebM. Akukho izimpawu zamanzi ezengeziwe.

form.supported: Amapulatifomu asekelwayo: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, VK, Vimeo
form.vpnHint: Uma isixhumanisi singavulekanga noma ividiyo ingadlali — zama ukucisha i-VPN bese uchofoza "Londoloza ifayela" futhi

error.notFound: Akukho okutholakele kuleli khonkco. Hlola i-URL bese uzama futhi.
error.rateLimited: Izicelo eziningi kakhulu. Zama futhi ngemva kwemizuzwana {seconds}.
error.tooManyRequests: Izicelo eziningi kakhulu. Sicela ulinde umzuzu.
error.serverError: Iphutha lomseva. Sicela uzame futhi kamuva.
error.network: Iphutha lokuxhuma. Hlola uxhumano lwakho lwe-inthanethi bese uzama futhi.
error.unknown: Kwenzeke okuthile okungalungile. Sicela uzame futhi.

500.title: Iphutha leseva
500.description: Kukhona okungahambanga kahle. Sicela uzame futhi emuva kwesikhathi.

footer.description: Uthuluzi lwamahhala oluku-inthanethi lokulanda amavidiyo ezinkundleni ezidumile.
